message: Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm feeling generous today.
Meet me halfway, Alice. Let's get this over with.

I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up all the power.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of. This is my final offer.
